title: Add morning show to schedule

requirements.text: Create a new show entry for a morning show with ID, title, description, and optional image
acceptanceCriteria: A new show is created in the backend shows stable variable
The show appears in the ShowManagement component in the admin dashboard
The show appears as an option in the AddScheduleDialog show selection dropdown

requirements.text: Add a weekday morning schedule entry for the new morning show with appropriate time slot (e.g., 6:00 AM - 10:00 AM)
acceptanceCriteria: Schedule entries are created for Monday through Friday in the backend schedules stable variable
The morning show schedule appears in the ScheduleView component on the homepage
The schedule displays in the correct day-of-week columns with formatted time ranges
The schedule entries appear in the ScheduleManagement component in the admin dashboard

constraints: Use the existing show and schedule data structures defined in backend/main.mo
Follow the existing CRUD patterns for shows and schedules
Use BigInt format for time values (hours and minutes) as implemented in existing schedule dialogs
Maintain the single-actor architecture in backend/main.mo
nonGoals: Modifying the existing weekend schedule with Mark Huotari
Changing the schedule display format or layout

required: Morning show promotional banner with sunrise theme and radio microphone (morning-show-banner.dim_800x400.png)
